title: The Rescue 1-4
author: MagPlus
body:
Note: Enhanced Version removed from package on Nov 20, 2019 as it was causing issues for some players.

Note: Package updated Aug 18, 2016 with additional enhanced Version with the following changes:

- GAME OVER text
- Clear Background
- Ammo Counter
- Flare delay displayed
- New moves like jump out of crawlspace
- New straps mod
walkthrough:

<body lang=DE style='tab-interval:.5in;text-justify-trim:punctuation'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif";
color:maroon'>THE RESCUE</span></b><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
"Arial","sans-serif"'> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Level
1: The Secret Temple</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Level
by Pascal Ducey (Magplus)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Walkthrough
written by Ted Simpson (Tombaholic) <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Secrets:
6 <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>NOTE:
NW = northwest, SE = southeast, etc. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Part
1 <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>SPIKE
BALL ROOM </span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>The
level opens with Lara sliding down and off a short ramp. When you land,
immediately jump back and off the landing, and grasp the edge. Wait while 2
spiked balls go whizzing past your head. Drop down and proceed forward toward
the gap. Before jumping over [stay well back from the edge], wait while another
spiked ball comes toward you and drops into the gap. Below and to the left of
the gap is a small landing. Jumping here will stop the earthquake. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>From
this small landing you can see monkey bars under the walkway above. You can use
these to move to the end of the room. [But if you have trouble with the grab,
you can instead use the back flip and grab maneuver described below and simply
stroll across the walkway and jump down to the tile.] Swing over, drop, grab
and shimmy to the right where you can climb up on a narrow ledge. In the corner
is a yellow-and blue floor tile. Stand on this square to reveal a switch on the
pillar back where you entered the room. To get back there, you'll need to jump
back & forth on the sloping sides of the room below you, while moving back
toward the small platform near the center. From there, a back flip to the slope
behind, continuing into a forward jump and grab will put you back on the upper
walkway. Jump over and pull the switch to open the door on the wall above. Make
the jump to the now open alcove and pull the lever, which puts out the flame
below the ladder. Make your way to the ladder and exit the room. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>ROOM
WITH BURNING EYEPIECE/UNDERWATER TUNNELS</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>In
the next room, you will find a lever in the middle of each of the 4 walls. Pull
them each, but do it quickly as you will soon be pursued by a <b><span
style='color:red'>fire demon</span></b>. Pulling all 4 levers fills the pit
below with water; jump in quickly to get rid of them. Notice the underwater
lever beneath the burning pedestal - pull it. Head into the tunnel (north). To
the right is another underwater lever to pull. Explore the short network of
tunnels (picking up the <b><span style='color:blue'>flares</span></b>), until
you find the opening at the back to climb out. Activate the reach-in switch to
extinguish the flame on the pedestal. Return for the <b><span style='color:
navy'>EYE PIECE</span></b>, and then grab <b><span style='color:blue'>small
medpaks</span></b> in the SE and SW corners of the room and <b><span
style='color:blue'>red shotgun shells</span></b> in the water near the entrance
to the water tunnel. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>MUMMY
ROOM</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Swim
back up the tunnel through the now-open door at the end and up through the
opening straight ahead. Let Lara slide into the pink liquid below and walk
directly ahead (WITHOUT STOPPING) to the platform at the other end of the room
and climb out before the flames ignite the pool. Climb the pole in the corner
and avoid the annoying <b><span style='color:red'>mummy</span></b>. Back-flip
from the pole to the raised landing and push the button. This raises another
block at the back of the room, giving you access to the second <b><span
style='color:navy'>EYE PIECE</span></b> [on top of the tall pillar in the NW corner]
as well as a small crawlspace in the darkened corner where you will find <b><span
style='color:blue'>revolver ammo</span></b>. After getting them, head across
the flat squares above the slope on the left, back toward the entrance to the
room to find <b><span style='color:green'>Secret #1</span></b> (<b><span
style='color:blue'>Uzi clips</span></b> and <b><span style='color:blue'>blue
shotgun shells</span></b>). Carefully angle a running jump to the ladder, which
has appeared by the entrance, and leave the room. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Back
in the water, make a left around the corner and surface in the next room. Shoot
the <b><span style='color:red'>scorpion</span></b>. As you approach the door,
the grate in the floor will burst into flames. Carefully jump to the recessed
area between the sloping stone blocks. From there, angle a jump onto the next
sloping block on your side & hold the jump key while flipping back &
forth on the blocks and toward the door until you land on flat ground. Combine
the EYE PIECES and use the <b><span style='color:navy'>EYE OF HORUS</span></b>
to open the door. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>ROOM
WITH BURNING HAND OF SIRIUS</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Enter
the room with the flaming pedestal and shoot another <b><span style='color:
red'>scorpion</span></b>. Go down the hall to the left and stand on the
yellow-and-blue square, which opens another door back in the flaming pedestal
room. Use the monkey bars overhead to swing back out, or the door will close
when you cross the other colored square. SLOWLY proceed into the now open hall
on the other side of the room until the spikes pop up in front of you. [Turn
around and locate the ladder.] Jump up & grab the landing above [back flip]
and proceed on and down to the end of the hallway and pull the lever. Head back
to the flaming pedestal room, where a new block has been raised, giving you
access to an overhead switch. Pull it to open the large stone door leading to
the next room. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>No
time to look around as the <b><span style='color:red'>fire demon</span></b> has
reappeared. Head into the next room and straight toward the back wall (avoid
falling into the empty pools in the middle of the room). On the back wall are 2
buttons, to the left and right of the carved stone door. Push them to fill the
pools then jump in to dampen those fire demons. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>End
of Part 1 <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Part
2 <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>ROOM
WITH THREE POOLS</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>There
are 3 pools in this room -- north, middle and south. Beginning in the north
pool, follow a tunnel to a room with an underwater switch. Pulling this switch
opens a gate in the south pool, giving access to a second underwater switch
there. Pulling the switch in the south pool opens the gate in the middle pool.
Before leaving the south pool, pick up the <b><span style='color:blue'>flares</span></b>
in the room at the east end. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Pull
the underwater switch in the middle pool to open a gate in the north (first
pool). Find the <b><span style='color:blue'>blue shotgun</span></b> <b><span
style='color:blue'>shells</span></b> before leaving the pool. Back in the north
pool, go through the open gate and follow the tunnel to an upper level. Push
(action key) the doors to open them and go right to find an overhead switch.
Pulling it raises a block near the entrance to the room. Drop down and climb
these blocks. Turning to face the entrance, you will see a lions head statue
on the wall. Shoot it to drop a rope to your left. Using the rope, swing over
to the next landing. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Open
the doors and slide down, catching the pole. Turn to face the door on the right
(as you entered), positioning Lara for a back flip into the door on the left.
Pull the switch (dropping 2 more ropes in the center of the pool room), and
then use the pole to back flip to the right door and exit. Make your way back
up the blocks at the entrance and carefully line up a running jump to the first
new rope. From there, swing and jump to the second rope. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Turn
to the right and make a tricky short swing/jump to the small landing (notice
that the landing to the left is on fire). From the small landing, shoot the
second lions head statue. This opens a door leading to the <b><span
style='color:navy'>HAND</span></b> <b><span style='color:navy'>OF ORION</span></b>.
To get there, head back through the north pool tunnel to the upper level. This
time, turn left and line up a running jump/grab to the landing across the way.
Go around the corner and get the puzzle piece. Notice the other door in this
hallway -- youll come back to it later. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Back
around the corner, on the landing and facing south, you can see that the flame
is now out on the other small landing. Line up a running jump/grab, arcing
slightly in midair to reach the landing, where you shoot the third lions head
statue. Use the rope to swing across to the other small landing. Looking south,
you will see another landing in the corner of the room. A running jump/grab
with a slight arc will get you there. [Don't start making your arc until you're
past the pillar to your left.] Go around the corner and down the hall to pull a
lever. A flyby shows you that the flame guarding the <b><span style='color:
navy'>HAND OF SIRIUS</span></b> is now out. [Go get it, then place the two
Hands in their receptacles in the large columns straddling the middle pool in
the pool room.] <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Placing
the 2 HANDS opens the carved stone door at the back of the room. It also
releases the 3 <b><span style='color:red'>hounds</span></b>, so be prepared to
deal with them. Head part the newly opened door to the next room. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>ROOM
WITH GIANT GOLDEN SETH EFFIGIES</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Walk
out onto the hand of the giant gold dog effigy. Across the way, a gate and a
flame block your path. Turn around and, using the ladder wall, make your way
down to the opening in the wall above the bridge. Activate the reach-in switch
to put out the first flame above. Make your way across the bridge and climb to
another dark opening. At the back, a lever opens the gate above. Make your way
back up the ladder wall and cross statue with a running jump/grab to the hand
on the hand at other side. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Go
through the door and shoot the <b><span style='color:red'>scorpion</span></b>.
Push the button on the left, which releases another <b><span style='color:red'>fire
demon</span></b>. Fortunately, it also clears the water in the pool below, so
turn and head back to the statue room and take a dive. Under the bridge is an
under water lever to open the door leading out onto the second giant statue
above. Toward the far end of the pool is a landing with another button that
opens the 3rd stone door after the second giant statue. [Reverse roll, angle
Lara to the left and take a running jump to the landing in front of the
climbing ladder.] <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Go
back up the ladder wall and across again to the other side of the room. Inside
the door, a ramp leads up to the right. Run up and cut to the right as quickly
as you can to avoid spiked ball that comes crashing down. At the top of the
ramp is a hallway to the left. [Take a standing jump to it.] Push the button to
extinguish the flame on the hand of the other large statue. Run or jump down
the other side of the ramp and cut to the right quickly as another spiked ball
follows you. You can now make your way across to the room in the SW corner,
taking care of another <b><span style='color:red'>demon hound</span></b> as you
enter. Pull the overhead switch in the back right corner of the room. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>A
cut scene shows a door opening somewhere. Its the one in the hallway where you
got the HAND OF ORION earlier. To get there and pick up a Secret along the way,
head back over the statue and up and down the ramp. At the bottom of the ramp
is a small opening of water. Jump in and pick up <b><span style='color:green'>Secret
#2</span></b> (<b><span style='color:blue'>large</span></b> <b><span
style='color:blue'>medpak</span></b>). Now follow this water tunnel back to
north pool tunnel (the gate will open as you approach), where you can access
the upper level and the newly opened door. [Turn left when you emerge over the
pool room. Take a running jump and grab to the next landing. Pull up and run
forward, turning right at the bend. Turn left into the open door.] Pushing the
button raises a block back in the room off the dog statue room. Make your way
back there. [Retrace your steps back to the upper entrance overlooking the pool
room, turn right, jump back into the water hole, swim south a short distance
until you reach the intersection, turn right and then make a quick left to
return to the pool room. Go through the door to the east (marked by a mound of
dirt) to bring you back to the dog statue room. Take a running jump and grab to
the other side, then turn right and go up the ramp and down the other side.
Take another running jump and grab from the first gold hand to the other, then
pull up and run forward into the next room to locate the raised block.] <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Climb
and shimmy to a landing with a button. Push it and take a running jump across
to a ladder opposite. Jump to the next landing and look to the right for a
landing with an overhead switch. Pulling the switch opens the doors above. Make
your way up and through the doors. At the back of this room, climb down the
ladder wall and find the water opening. Jump in and follow the blue tunnel to
the next room. [Ignore the passage leading downward, which ends at a closed
door.] <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>End
of Part 2 <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Part
3 <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>COURTYARD
WITH FOUR LARGE DOORS</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>On
the wall to the left of the north doors is a climbable grate. At the top,
arrange a jump over to the ledge above the west doors. Find the overhead switch
and pull it, raising a block in the room above where you entered. Return via
the water tunnel and ladder. Take care of the <b><span style='color:red'>demon
hounds</span></b> that have shown up, then climb to the alcove and push the
button. This opens a gate in the courtyard, giving you access to a yellow
globe. [Climb back down the ladder and swim through the water tunnel until you
return to the courtyard.] <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Back
In the courtyard, youll see 4 circles on the floor around the center of the
room. Drag the first globe on to the SE circle to open the southern doors.
Before entering, take a detour for the next Secret. Pushing the button upstairs
has released a rope above the east doors. Climb back up [using the ladder near
the NW corner], and using the ledges and the rope, make your way around to the
ledge above the south doors for <b><span style='color:green'>Secret #3</span></b>:
<b><span style='color:blue'>flares</span></b> [and <b><span style='color:blue'>Uzi
ammo</span></b>]. The quickest way down is to safety drop to the raised pillar
in the corner below, losing just a bit of health. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>URN
PUZZLE </span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Go
through the southern doors and past two inaccessible globes until you reach a
yellow urn. Push it ahead to the yellow-and-blue square to open a door in a
hallway a couple steps back. Here another urn awaits. Locate the dark circle on
the floor at the end of this hallway; youll need to maneuver the urn there to
open the next door in the adjacent hallway. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Inside
that door is a lever [beside the closed door] to open the final door where
another dark circle graces the floor. Youll need to move the first urn here to
complete the puzzle. (Note: Another yellow-and-blue square in the hallway
outside here is a trick. If you move the urn there, it will close the door).
[You can side flip behind the urn when you get it to the fatal square.] Now you
can access another globe in the hallway outside. This globe must be placed on
the NE circle in the courtyard to open the eastern doors. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Head
through the doors and down the stairs to a room where youll need to use the
landings and rope to get to the other side, where youll find an antechamber
with a closed gate straight ahead and a open doorway to the right. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>TREASURE
ROOM </span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Head
to the right and up the stairs to find your prize: <b><span style='color:navy'>THE
AMULET OF HORUS</span></b>. Grabbing the AMULET opens the gate back in the
antechamber, but first youll want to get some goodies here. Along each side of
the stairway is a wall topped with columns. Behind the wall to the left (as you
look out of the room) is another yellow urn. Move it to the colored square to
open a door hidden above in the right corner of the room. There, at the top of
the stairs, jump and climb to a crawlspace to find <b><span style='color:green'>Secret
#4</span></b>: <b><span style='color:blue'>red shotgun shells</span></b>. Before
getting down, shimmy to the left to find some <b><span style='color:blue'>Uzi
clips</span></b>. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Now
climb over the wall to the right (as you look out) of the stairway [the one
down below opposite the urn you pushed earlier] to find some <b><span
style='color:blue'>revolver ammo</span></b>. Now you can head back down to the
antechamber, but youll have to move to the left or right after clearing the
door to avoid being pin-cushioned by the rolling spike ball that follows you.
At the same time, draw your pistols to dispose of the demon hound lurking
below. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>As
you enter the antechamber, you may notice a block rising in the corner. Ignore
it for now and head through the now-open gate door [to the east]. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>FIRE
PIT ROOM</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Make
running jump over the fire pit and enter the room behind. Notice the alcove
with a button in the wall above. Turn right and climb the ladder, then jump
across to the next pillar. A dark crawlspace on the left hides a vase. Crouch
and shoot it, then crawl in to get the <b><span style='color:blue'>Uzi clips</span></b>.
Back out on the pillar, face the opening in the wall opposite. Make a running
jump, hitting the action key in the air, to land in the opening. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Use
the monkey bars to (taking the path to the right) to clear the nasty looking
pool. (NOTE: Getting on the monkey bars is a bit tricky. From the back of your
small landing, do a run & jump, then immediately press and hold action to
grab the bars). At the other side, shoot the vase then make your way back to
the fire pit room. A block is now in place under the alcove with the button. A
flyby shows the flame going out in front of the other globe in the recess off
the courtyard. Head back to the antechamber. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>COLONNADE
ROOM</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Now
use the raised block to access the crawlspace in the corner. (POSSIBLE BUG: If
this block disappears, just cross back into the treasure room to re-trigger
it). Drop down from the crawlspace and deal with the waiting demon hound. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Move
toward the back of the room and down the ramp to retrieve the <b><span
style='color:blue'>flares</span></b>. Turn around and head up the ramp until
you can jump and grab the wall on your left between the last two columns.
Notice the small window and the stairs behind; youll be there later. Draw your
pistols and angle a jump past the last column to the back of the room. Shoot
the mangy <b><span style='color:red'>demon hound</span></b> that comes from the
doorway. Now you can pick up <b><span style='color:green'>Secret #5</span></b>:
<b><span style='color:blue'>normal grenades</span></b>. Push to open the doors
and return to the courtyard. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Move
the next globe into place on the NW circle to open the northern doors. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>ROOM
WITH SLOPING PILLARS</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Head
through the northern doors and around the corner. The sequence here is as
follows: Make a running jump and grab to the pillar directly ahead. Shimmy to
the right. Pull up and slide down the other side almost to the bottom, then
jump and grab the edge of the pillar ahead. Facing north, youll see a landing
with a yellow-and-blue tile across the room. Use the monkey bars to get there.
Landing on the tile will open the exit door in the SW corner. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Monkey
swing back to the flat pillar. Facing east, do a standing jump from the front
of the pillar to the sloping pillar below (hold down the jump key until you
land). Do a short slide then jump to the next sloping pillar. Continue holding
the jump key as you hit this pillar, then the next, until you land safely on
the platform below. Climb the ladder ahead. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>VASE
AND URN PUZZLE</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Begin
by shooting all the vases. There are 4 altogether, including one hidden above,
that you access through a hole in the ceiling of the hallway at the top of the
ladder (this is the passage glimpsed through the window in the colonnade room).
With all 4 vases shattered, you can now go back for the final Secret of the
level. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Back
in the room you just came from, the water is now blue and sparkling. Jump in
and find the opening on the south wall, and the large medpak inside. Now swim
across and find the opening on the north wall and <b><span style='color:green'>Secret
#6</span></b>: <b><span style='color:blue'>revolver ammo</span></b> and <b><span
style='color:blue'>Uzi clips</span></b>. Swim back to the ladder and climb to
the passage above. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>There
are 2 dark circles in this small network of hallways. Ignore the one you see
directly ahead as you climb off the ladder (Moving the urn here shuts a door
which makes it impossible to move the urn to the other circle. To open the door
you have to swim back and repeat the previous steps of this section.). Instead
maneuver the urn to the circle at the end of the other hallway. Once it is in
place, a cut scene shows a hidden door has been opened back off the courtyard.
Return there via the water tunnel near at hand. [When the door at the end of
the tunnel opens for you, swim up and turn left, not right, to get back to the
courtyard. Remember that the globes are down the south hall.] The door is next
to where you got the last 2 globes, and the final puzzle piece is inside. Move
the globe to the last available circle to open the western doors. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Head
through the western doors to find yourself in a dark room with a <b><span
style='color:red'>mummy</span></b> at the far end. Along the left-hand wall
make three jumps over the deep trenches to the platform where the mummy is.
Climb the block in the corner and jump to the monkey bars. Follow the monkey
bars all the way around to the lighted crawl space and use it to enter the next
room. Inside, push open the doors and prepare to deal with a bit of nastiness on
the other side. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>SETH'S
LAIR</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>As
you enter, a flyby shows a crystal wall shattering and nasty old Seth storms
out. Hes mellowed with age, though, because he wont attack Lara when shes on
the upper level -- hell just stomp around below growling. He is deadly,
though, once youre below, so you have to keep moving and use medpaks as
needed. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Ignore
all the things in the room that look like they are meant for climbing or monkey
swinging. The objective here is to activate three switches and get out. The exit
is in the SW corner of the room on the upper level. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>The
fastest way to get all three switches is as follows: <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>First,
jump in to the water below and follow the pool clockwise until you reach a
tunnel. Follow the tunnel to the underwater switch and pull it. Follow the
tunnel back to open water and exit the pool to the north. Turn right and run
past the chamber from which Seth first appeared and find the button in the NE
corner of the room (ground level). You must now make your way up to the top
level using the raised block at the SW corner of central ground level. Once up,
turn right [the exit door is to the left] and make a running jump over to the
north side of the room and push the button on the north wall, opening the door
to the exit. Head back and go through the exit and down the ramp to end the
level.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Level
2: Edfou, Kingdom of Horus</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
"Arial","sans-serif"'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Level
by Pascal Ducey (Magplus)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Walkthrough
written by Ted Simpson (Tombaholic) <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Secrets:
6 (7 - 12)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>NOTE:
NW = northwest, SE = southeast, etc. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>UNDERGROUND
CAVERN</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Before
moving, note the <b><span style='color:blue'>revolver ammo</span></b> on the
floor ahead. Pick it up quickly, then run immediately toward the rear of the
room as a boulder comes crashing down. Pick up the <b><span style='color:blue'>Uzi
clips</span></b> near the ladder, then STAND STILL. Another boulder will crash
down in front of the ladder, after which it is safe to climb up to the top. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>When
you reach the top, turn around to find <b><span style='color:green'>Secret #7</span></b>:
The <b><span style='color:navy'>Uzi</span></b> on a ledge. Shimmy along the
sloped ledge to retrieve it, and then head back to the corridor at the top of
the ladder. Follow the corridor - shooting 2 <b><span style='color:red'>bats</span></b>
along the way - until you reach an opening to the outside. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>COURTYARD
WITH BURNING PEDESTAL</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Climb
up to the top of the opening and be prepared to shoot the armed <b><span
style='color:red'>baddie</span></b> waiting to ambush you at the bottom of the
ramp. That done, shoot the 2 vases at the top of the ramp - one contains <b><span
style='color:blue'>Uzi clips</span></b> and the other holds <b><span
style='color:blue'>red shotgun ammo</span></b>. Take note of the closed gate in
the east wall, then head down through the opening near the burning pedestal and
into the fountain courtyard. Pick up the <b><span style='color:blue'>red
shotgun ammo</span></b> in the SW corner. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>COURTYARD
WITH LAND ROVER</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Head
through one of the openings in the north wall to emerge in another courtyard
where a Land Rover sits idling. To the right is a carved stone door flanked by
2 gem locks. Youll need to find those gems. Begin by going west to a small
lagoon. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>CLOISTER
WITH LARGE IRON GATE</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Jump
in and swim directly across to the ramp on the other side. Climb out and go
left on the narrow quay to find <b><span style='color:blue'>Uzi clips</span></b>.
Now do a jump/grab to the archway above the ramp and jump down to the stairs on
the other side. When you reach the bottom of the stairs, 2 hounds attack. Take
care of them, then have a look around the cloister you have entered. In the SW
corner is a large iron gate. In a room to the north is the MOTORBIKE in a
locked garage. Shoot the vases near the garage to find <b><span
style='color:blue'>explosive crossbow ammo</span></b> and a <b><span
style='color:blue'>small</span></b> <b><span style='color:blue'>medpak</span></b>.
Lara will return here toward the end of the level, but for now return via the
stairs and archway to the lagoon. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>LAGOON</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Jump
back in the water and turn right (south) and swim through an opening under the
building [past the pursuing <b><span style='color:red'>crocodile</span></b>].
Immediately turn left and make for the small quay where you can climb out and
shoot the [other] <b><span style='color:red'>crocodile</span></b> that pursues
you. Shoot the vase on the nearby sand ledge. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Now
you can swim toward the other end of this small channel, picking up a <b><span
style='color:blue'>small medpak</span></b> and, just around the corner, <b><span
style='color:navy'>THE DIAMOND OF THE NILE</span></b>. Turn back and dodge the <b><span
style='color:red'>crocodile</span></b> thats waiting to chomp you. Swim back
through the opening into the lagoon with the boat. If the croc follows you,
climb out and take care of him with the weapon of your choice. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>In
the NW corner of the lagoon is a small fissure leading into another pool. Once through,
swim past the building, make a right and head for the archway in the wall to
the east, where Lara can climb out. Turn and shoot the <b><span
style='color:red'>crocodile</span></b> that chases you (NOTE: You can climb out
on the ramp to the west, but then you have to deal with the crocodile and an
armed <b><span style='color:red'>baddie</span></b> simultaneously). Then, turn
and deal with the <b><span style='color:red'>crocodile</span></b> in the pool
on the other side of the archway. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Now
swim over to the landing by the closed gate. Behind it is the other DIAMOND,
but you have some more work to do before getting it. Shoot the vase above on
the sand bank. The gate at the back of the courtyard where you began is now
open, so youll need to head back. On the way, though, make a small detour for
a Secret. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Head
back through the archway between the 2 pools. Make a left and swim in the
narrow channel between the yellow building and a quay with a stone bench. As
you go, keep your eye out for a small opening at the foot of the building that
you can swim through. Inside, climb on to the landing. Angle a running jump to
the ladder across the room. [It's actually easier to take a standing jump and
grab to the fissure in the wall, then shimmy to the right until you reach the
ladder.] Climb up, then do a rolling back flip and grab the ladder behind. Move
left and around the corner on the ladder until you reach its end. Do a rolling
back flip with a grab to the platform behind you and pick up <b><span
style='color:green'>Secret #8</span></b>: a <b><span style='color:blue'>large
medpak</span></b> & <b><span style='color:blue'>revolver ammo</span></b>.
Dive back in the water and return to the first courtyard. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>COURTYARD
WITH BURNING PEDESTAL</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>As
you enter, a <b><span style='color:red'>hound</span></b> attacks from the left.
Take care of him and head through the small doorway in the corner. Deal with
another <b><span style='color:red'>hound</span></b> that sneaks up from the
right as you enter. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Using
the blocks, begin climbing and jumping until you reach a darkened balcony
above. Grab the <b><span style='color:blue'>grenade gun super ammo</span></b>
on the block to the right of the dark doorway. Then head through the door and
to the right. Activate the reach-in switch at the corridors end to open the
gate blocking the second DIAMOND. At the other end of the corridor, you can
look through a locked gate at the rooftop, but you cant open it. So return the
way you came and go fetch the gem. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>COURTYARD
WITH LAND ROVER</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Once
you have the second <b><span style='color:navy'>DIAMOND OF THE NILE</span></b>
in hand, use the 2 gems to open the carved stone door in the courtyard with the
Land Rover. An armed <b><span style='color:red'>baddie</span></b> and a <b><span
style='color:red'>hound</span></b> wait inside to ambush Lara. A <b><span
style='color:red'>bat</span></b> will also pester you. So clear the area of
enemies and pick up the <b><span style='color:blue'>flares</span></b> near the
south wall. The vase on top of the low wall at the back right also contains <b><span
style='color:blue'>blue shotgun shells</span></b>. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Now
jump on the block by the north wall and activate the reach-in switch to
extinguish the flame on the pedestal in the first courtyard. You can now
retrieve the <b><span style='color:navy'>GATE KEY</span></b> there. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>COURTYARD
WITH BULL STATUES</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>With
the key in hand, head back past the Land Rover to the courtyard at the far
north. In the columned depression, pick up the <b><span style='color:blue'>normal
crossbow ammo</span></b> and the <b><span style='color:blue'>grenade gun super
ammo</span></b>. Now deal with the armed <b><span style='color:red'>baddie</span></b>
who lurks below in the courtyard. Use the <b><span style='color:navy'>GATE KEY</span></b>
to open the gate at the back of the courtyard. Be prepared to blast the <b><span
style='color:red'>crocodile</span></b> that waits on the other side.<br>
<br>
Hop in the fountain pool and swim into the small opening to the south. Climb
out at the end of the channel to find the <b><span style='color:navy'>CROWBAR</span></b>
on one side and <b><span style='color:blue'>small medpak</span></b> and <b><span
style='color:blue'>Uzi clips</span></b> on the other. Now its time to pick up
some goodies and another Secret. Head back to the first courtyard [and into the
anteroom with blocks] and climb back up to the dark hallway with the reach-in
switch. You can now open the gate using the CROWBAR.<br>
<br>
<b>ATOP THE WALLS<o:p></o:p></b></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>As
you emerge through the gate, notice the <b><span style='color:blue'>large
medpak</span></b> ahead in the distance. Make your way over and get it. Now
return to the rooftop by the gate and continue south to the wall over the first
courtyard. Look into the small courtyard in the back to see the <b><span
style='color:blue'>revolver ammo</span></b> atop a column. Get it, and [take a
running] jump [and grab] to another column by the wall at the back of the
courtyard. Pick up the <b><span style='color:blue'>Uzi clips</span></b>. Climb
onto the wall. Behind the wall and below to the right lies <b><span
style='color:green'>Secret #9</span></b>: <b><span style='color:blue'>grenade
gun flash ammo</span></b>. At the other end of the narrow conduit you will find
more <b><span style='color:blue'>Uzi clips</span></b>.<br>
<br>
<b>SMALL COURTYARD WITH SLOPING BLOCK</b> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Head
back to the lagoon and swim again through the small fissure In the NW corner.
This time, get out on the ramp and enter another small courtyard guarded by an
armed <b><span style='color:red'>baddie</span></b>. Take care of him and pick
up the <b><span style='color:blue'>red</span></b> <b><span style='color:blue'>shotgun
shells</span></b> he drops. Behind the sloping block is another gate that Lara
can open with the CROWBAR. But first, climb the block by the small door, and
then angle a [running] jump/grab up to the higher block in the SW corner. Pick
up a <b><span style='color:blue'>small medpak</span></b> and activate the
reach-in switch to open a second gate inside the passageway below. Jump down
and shoot the <b><span style='color:red'>crocodile</span></b> that charges in.
Open the gate using the CROWBAR and pick up another <b><span style='color:navy'>GATE
KEY</span></b> inside.<br>
<br>
<b>BLUE-CARPETED HALLWAY</b><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Run
up the blue-carpeted stairs, but stop as you turn the corner to avoid sliding
into the firetrap. Before jumping across, turn and look up to find a small
alcove containing <b><span style='color:green'>Secret #10</span></b>: <b><span
style='color:blue'>red shotgun shells</span></b>, <b><span style='color:blue'>Uzi
clips</span></b> and <b><span style='color:blue'>small medpak</span></b>.
Afterwards, make a running jump across the firetrap to the slanted block,
continue to hold the jump key to clear the next firetrap and then grab the
block ahead and pull up. One more standing jump/grab across a third firetrap
puts you in the upper hallway.<br>
<br>
Jump the deep pit and move beyond the slightly sloping square. After a second,
a boulder falls behind you, revealing an opening in the ceiling. Go back and
climb up to get the <b><span style='color:navy'>GOLDEN STAR</span></b> there.
Now continue back down the hallway over the second pit and through the door at
the end. Shoot 2 <b><span style='color:red'>hounds</span></b> loitering on the
terrace and place the GOLDEN STAR in the receptacle at the far end. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>CLOISTER
WITH LARGE IRON GATE</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>When
you place the star, you hear a gate open below. Looking down from the terrace,
youll spot 2 <b><span style='color:red'>demon</span></b> <b><span
style='color:red'>hounds</span></b> waiting below. Finish them off from the
safety of the terrace if you like. Drop down and find the MOTORCYCLE waiting
behind the newly opened gates. Before you can use it, youll have to open the
large iron gates across the way. <br>
<br>
Now move toward the large iron gates. As you approach, look for the dark
underground passage on the right. Enter the underground passage and open the
gate with your CROWBAR. Climb the ladder to the room above. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>WHITE
TILED ROOM</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Begin
by climbing over the wall that is to your right as you enter the room. On the
other side, shoot 2 <b><span style='color:red'>bats</span></b> and then open
the gate near the flame with your CROWBAR. Enter and drop down into the trough
to your left to retrieve <b><span style='color:green'>Secret #11</span></b>: <b><span
style='color:blue'>revolver ammo</span></b> and <b><span style='color:blue'>Uzi
clips</span></b>. <br>
<br>
Now, position Lara at the bottom of the ramp, just to the right of the
centerline. Run about halfway up and stop as 2 boulders begin to descend, the
left one slightly ahead of the right. The moment the left one has passed, do a
left jump to avoid the second one. Now ascend to the top and use your GATE KEY
to open the gate. Drop down inside and shoot the vase. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Return
to the main room and climb over the wall on the other side. Shoot a couple more
pesky <b><span style='color:red'>bats</span></b>, then open the gate near the
flame. Repeat the climb up the ramp exactly as before and shoot the vase at the
top. You can now return to the main room and pick up the 2 <b><span
style='color:navy'>DIAMONDS OF THE NIL</span></b> (the second gate will open as
you pick up the first gem).<br>
<br>
Place the first gem in its receptacle on the north side (right side as you
entered the room). Dont linger on the blue tile as a boulder comes rolling
down from behind. Cross the room and place the second gem in its receptacle to
the south. Again, beware of the boulder. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Turn
right and climb the short wall, then up to the higher block. Turn around and
climb to the next ledge above (with the black and white tiles). Pick up the <b><span
style='color:blue'>small medpak</span></b>, and then return to the higher block
below. Look for a gap in the wall opposite and do a jump/grab to it. Shimmy
left and pull up in the alcove for some <b><span style='color:blue'>blue</span></b>
<b><span style='color:blue'>shotgun shells</span></b>, then continue to shimmy
to the left until Lara can pull up into the next hallway. Make note of the
locked door on your right, then run down the hallway and around the corner.
Jump the gap (the boulders wont fall unless you touch the blue squares at the
bottom). <br>
<br>
Continue down to the end of the corridor, shooting 2 more <b><span
style='color:red'>bats</span></b> along the way. You have found the second
GOLDEN STAR but it is still locked away. Drop down and shimmy left to an alcove
to retrieve another <b><span style='color:navy'>GATE</span></b> <b><span
style='color:navy'>KEY</span></b>. Jump to the ledge opposite and pick up the <b><span
style='color:blue'>flares</span></b>. Now return to the south end of the upper
hallway and use the GATE KEY to open the gate. Activate the reach-in switch to
open the gate guarding the <b><span style='color:navy'>GOLDEN STAR</span></b>.
With the STAR in hand, make your way back to the cloister outside. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>CLOISTER
WITH LARGE IRON GATE</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Return
to the room with the MOTORCYCLE and place the second GOLDEN STAR in its
receptacle. Get on the bike and ride toward the large iron gates, which are now
open. Stop as you enter and line yourself up for a straight run up the slope
ahead. Hit the gas and dont let up as you clear the jump above. On the other
side, continue to accelerate until you have made it over the second jump. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>AREA
WITH DEEP PIT AND MAZE</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
"Arial","sans-serif"'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Climb
off the bike and look over the pit to the west. Jump to the block jutting out
over the pit. Turn around to face east and do a safety drop off of the block to
the pit below. Light a flare and find the short block to climb on. In a small
well on the other side, pick up the <b><span style='color:blue'>revolver ammo</span></b>.
Climb back up, then up to the next landing where you must activate the reach-in
switch to open a gate back in the maze. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Climb
up to the next landing, and then use the ivy on the wall to ascend to the white
sandstone block above. Make a running jump back to the first block and the area
where you left the bike. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Now
enter the maze. As you turn the first corner, 2 <b><span style='color:red'>hounds</span></b>
lunge at Lara. A moment later, a third <b><span style='color:red'>hound</span></b>
will come around the corner. After dealing with them, go to the end of the
first alleyway and turn left. Find the opening at the end and climb up. Use the
ivy on the wall on the other side to climb down into the deep pit. Light a
flare and pick up <b><span style='color:green'>Secret #12</span></b>: <b><span
style='color:blue'>crossbow explosive ammo</span></b> and <b><span
style='color:blue'>grenade gun normal ammo</span></b>. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Climb
back up the ivy-covered wall and head toward the east of the small maze,
staying to the left. Pick up the <b><span style='color:navy'>DIAMOND</span></b>
in an alcove and place it in the receptacle in the next alcove to open the last
gate. Head through the gateway and down the slope to end the level.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Levels
3 and 4: Philae's Ruins/The Timeless Sands</span></b><span style='font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><i><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>(NOTE:
These two levels are linked and must be played together.)</span></i><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Levels
By Pascal Ducey (Magplus)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Walkthrough
written by Ted Simpson (Tombaholic)<br>
<br>
Secrets: 8 (13 - 20)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>NOTE:
NW = northwest, SE = southeast, etc. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><i><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>PHILAE'S
RUINS</span></i></b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>ROOM
WITH RED-PATTERNED COLUMNS</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Pick
up <b><span style='color:blue'>blue shotgun shells</span></b> in the NE corner.
Notice the puzzle receptacle to the left of the door in the north wall. Laras
first objective is to find the piece that fits there. There are 2 alternatives
for doing this: <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><i><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>ALTERNATIVE
1</span></i><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>:
On the east wall are 3 buttons. Push the one on the left and the one right -
leave the middle one untouched. Now turn and go to the west side of the room.
At the base of the column in the middle is another button. Push it. You have
now raised 3 iron columns over the flames by the west wall. Climb to the one in
the NW corner and use a series of jumps to reach the red-patterned column in
the SW corner and pick up the <b><span style='color:navy'>EARTH KEY</span></b>.
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><i><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>ALTERNATIVE
2</span></i><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>:
If you feel like a fight, press only the MIDDLE button on the east wall. 2
black-and-green clad <b><span style='color:red'>ninjas</span></b> attack Lara.
Send them to the next life and one will drop the <b><span style='color:navy'>EARTH
KEY</span></b> as he expires. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Once
you have the key, place it in the receptacle. A tremor erupts, up heaving the
room behind you. Run to the SE corner and find the <b><span style='color:navy'>WATER
KEY</span></b>. Make your way to the SW corner of the room. Dont step on the
grate in the newly created pool or Lara will have a long, and ultimately
unpleasant, fall. Climb the rocks in the SW corner and find the receptacle for
the WATER KEY. Placing the key fills the tunnel in the pool with water,
allowing a <b><span style='color:red'>crocodile</span></b> to escape. Shoot the
varmint and head down the water tunnel. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>WATER
TUNNEL</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
