none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>First,
head straight down and pick up the <b><span style='color:blue'>flares</span></b>.
Now swim down the tunnel heading to the south and climb out at the end. As you
ascend the stairs, be prepared for another <b><span style='color:red'>ninja</span></b>
ambush. Continue to the top and climb out. To the east is a deep, dark pit.
Look in carefully to find a block to which Lara can drop (light a flare if
necessary). Continue down to the bottom of the pit and find <b><span
style='color:green'>Secret #13</span></b>: <b><span style='color:blue'>grenade
gun flash ammo</span></b>. Climb back out of the pit. Theres no way to cross
it, so head back down the stairs. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>When
you turn the last corner of the stairs, look up to see a dark alcove above the
entrance to the water tunnel. Arrange a running jump/grab to the alcove and
pick up the <b><span style='color:navy'>SHOTGUN</span></b> + <b><span
style='color:blue'>red shotgun shells</span></b>. At the back of the alcove,
activate the reach-in switch. A cut scene shows an iron box rising in the pit
outside. Head back up the stairs and to the pit. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>OUTSIDE
BY THE DEEP PITS</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Standing
on the newly raised platform, arrange a running jump/grab to the opposite side
of the pit. Turn left and go around the corner into small channel in the sand.
Shoot a <b><span style='color:red'>scorpion</span></b> and pick up the <b><span
style='color:blue'>flares</span></b> at the end. Climb to a small opening in
the dunes to find yourself above another deep pit. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Use
the columns below to safely descend to the bottom. At the east and west ends
are 2 tunnel entrances. The one to the west is blocked, so head down in to the
other. As you head down the tunnel, notice the small gold statue behind the
gate on your right. Continue down the tunnel into the next level. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><i><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>THE
TIMELESS SANDS</span></i></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><br
style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
<![if !supportLineBreakNewLine]><br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><br>
<br>
<b>LARGE LAVA ROOM</b><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>As
Lara enters, a block rises to her left and a flyby shows the room below:
ledges, switches, ropes - and lots of bubbling lava at the bottom. This puzzle
can be solved different ways; here is one. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Begin
by turning right and using the rope to swing to the ledge on the south wall.
Above the first raised platform, activate the reach-in switch to raise a block
along the east wall. Now WALK off the other side of platform and stop. A
gauntlet of spikes pops up from the floor ahead at timed intervals. To cross
it, youll need to carefully time a SPRINT to the other side. Start from just
off the raised platform and begin running when the spikes pop up. Press and
hold the sprint key (/) to clear the spikes in time. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>On
the other side is another reach-in switch above a short raised platform. This
switch raises a block in the NE part of the room. At the [east] end of the
ledge, turn and face north. Jump to the first raised block, then to the ledge
with the lever. Push it to raise a green block on the west wall. Now do a running
jump to the gray block on the north wall ahead, and a second running jump [and
grab] up to the next ledge with a lever. Pushing the lever raises a second
green block and lowers a third below, allowing access to the next switch. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Make
a long running jump to the top of the raised green blocks on the west wall
below. Do not push the next lever on the S ledge yet (or you will miss several
pickups and a Secret). Instead, turn toward the structure in the center of the
room and make a long running jump down to it. Drop to the sandy landing inside
and pick up the <b><span style='color:blue'>crossbow normal ammo</span></b>.
Look south for a ladder and an opening in the wall. Make a running jump + grab
to the ladder above the opening. With Lara dangling at the bottom of this
ladder, let go and then grab the ladder below the opening below. Pull inside,
activate the reach-in switch to raise a walkway around the perimeter of the
room. It also fills the bottom of the central structure behind you with sand.
So jump back down, shoot the <b><span style='color:red'>scorpion</span></b> and
pick up a <b><span style='color:blue'>small medpak</span></b> + <b><span
style='color:blue'>Uzi clips</span></b>. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Climb
back into the opening and make a running jump to the new walkway below. Shoot
the <b><span style='color:red'>hound</span></b> that waits there [to the west].
Turn left and run to the east side of the room [and take an angled jump around
the block]. Pick up the <b><span style='color:blue'>revolver ammo</span></b>
and shoot another <b><span style='color:red'>hound</span></b> that comes
running. Head to the north and look for the dark entrance to an alcove in the
north wall. Activate the reach-in switch to open the gate on the south wall.
Continue around to the west and the raised block with the jeweled chain. Pull
the chain, which raises a gray block in the SW corner of the room. As you leave
the block, shoot a couple of <b><span style='color:red'>bats</span></b> that
pester Lara. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Now
head to the open door in the south wall and <b><span style='color:green'>Secret
#14</span></b>. Pick up the <b><span style='color:blue'>large medpak</span></b>,
then step onto the left side of the ramp. When the spiked ball falls, quickly
run to the right to avoid it. Run up the right side of the ramp a bit to
trigger a second spiked ball. Jump to the left so it misses Lara. Now you can
safely pick up the <b><span style='color:blue'>small medpak</span></b> and <b><span
style='color:blue'>crossbow explosive ammo</span></b>. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>You
can now exit by the door at the top of the ramp [and bag an extra <b><span
style='color:red'>scorpion</span></b>] or, more easily, the way you came in. If
you choose the former route, shoot the <b><span style='color:red'>hound</span></b>
after you climb down the ladder. Head to the blocks in the SW corner of the
room. Climb until you reach the ledge that's level with the central structure
and make a running jump W across to it. Climb to the highest block atop this
structure. Lara must now make her way back to the switch on the west wall (the
one that she left alone earlier). This can be done by using the rope to swing
across W and then making a couple of jumps or by going back around the
perimeter ledges as before. [To reach the nearer rope, turn around and jump E
to the higher sloped ledge.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Turn back
around to face W, take a running jump and grab the rope.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Ignore the second rope and simply swing
forward and jump off to the W ledge.] <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Either
way, get Lara to the switch and push it. A flyby shows the central structure
filling with sand. Unseen, the gray block obstructing the last switch on the
ledge above disappears. Jump to the platform behind, turn and then jump up and
grab the ledge above and pull up. Push the final switch to reveal another
opening in the east wall of the central structure. From the south end of this
ledge, Lara can make a long running jump to the SW corner of the central
structure (with the loss of just a bit of health). <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Shoot
the scorpion running around inside [This is probably the scorpion you may have
shot earlier near the spike ball trap. If so, you won't see it here.], then
drop in and enter the new opening. Pull the chain to open the gate in the wall
opposite and make a running jump/grab to the opening. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>SMALL
YELLOW LAVA ROOM</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>As
you turn the corner, shoot 2 <b><span style='color:red'>scorpions</span></b>
and find yourself facing a golden receptacle. To the left of it, pick up the <b><span
style='color:blue'>red shotgun shells</span></b>. Turn and go toward the closed
gate and right into a sloping room. Look down the slope to see the spike pit
below. Lara will have to run down, chased by 2 spiked balls, and jump over the
spike pit to escape. If you stop just on the other side of the spike pit, you
can take a moment to plan your next move. A couple steps further and Lara
begins to slide toward a lava pit so youll have to think fast. Either way
youll need to arrange a jump down to the gray footpath below to the left. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>When
you land there, shoot a couple of bothersome <b><span style='color:red'>bats</span></b>.
Ascend to the platform against the south wall and use the rope to swing over to
the landing to the east. Shoot another <b><span style='color:red'>bat</span></b>
and enter the opening in the wall to find a lever. Push the lever to drop
another rope outside. A long running jump should just get you back to the
footpath below. Stand below the new rope and jump up to grab it. Use the rope
to swing up and into the opening above on the north wall. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>SWITCH
AND BLOCK PUZZLE</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>The
solution to this puzzle is as follows: Ignore the first lever you see as you
enter. Instead climb through an opening in the ceiling up to a upper hallway
and follow it to the end. Drop down and pull the chain. This opens the first
gate back by the first lever. Go back and, still ignoring the first lever, go
past it to find a second lever. Shoot the <b><span style='color:red'>scorpion</span></b>
that comes around the corner, and then push the second lever. This opens a door
back by the chain and lowers a block upstairs. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Return
to the upper hallway and make an immediate right into a newly opened passage.
Follow it to the end and drop down. Activate the reach-in switch there to open
a gate leading back to the first 2 levers. Now return and push the first lever
that you have ignored up to now. This opens the next gate in the lower hallway
and raises a block closing off the upper hallway. Follow the lower hallway
around the corner to the left to reach the next lever. Push the lever to open a
second upper hallway back at the beginning. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Return
to the starting point and pull up into the new upper hallway on the south side
of the opening in the ceiling. Push the fourth lever, which is inside. This
opens the last gate in the lower hallway by the chain. Head back there and
shoot the <b><span style='color:red'>scorpion</span></b> along the way. At the
end Lara can pick up the<b><span style='color:navy'> SACRED</span></b> <b><span
style='color:navy'>HOURGLASS</span></b>. Now make your way back to the lava
room and [take a standing] jump to the footpath. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>SMALL
YELLOW LAVA ROOM</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Use
the rope again to swing to the landing against the south wall. Below, at the
east end of the room is a small gray landing by the wall. Make a running jump
to get Lara there. Jump and grab the top of the wall and pull up. Go around the
green block to find the receptacle for the SACRED HOURGLASS [in the statue's
lap]. Placing it fills the room behind with sand and raises a footpath. 3 <b><span
style='color:red'>demonic hounds</span></b> also have appeared, so take care of
them. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>As
Lara steps onto the newly raised footpath, look to the left and right to see 2
openings that are now accessible. Enter the opening to the left and carefully
WALK toward the back. Spikes will pop up as Lara approaches the corner. Once
they have activated it is safe to pass and find <b><span style='color:navy'>CARTOUCHE
PIECE #1</span></b>. Cross the room now and enter the other opening. Poison
darts guard this corridor [so crawl past them]. At the end is <b><span
style='color:navy'>CARTOUCHE PIECE #2</span></b>. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Now
since a forest of lethal spikes blocks the entrance where you came into this
room, Lara will have to find another way out. Look back toward the statue where
you placed THE SACRED HOURGLASS. The green block in front of it has disappeared
to reveal another lever. Push the lever and a flyby reveals the location of the
exit. Make your way there and climb the ladder to the landing above. As you
enter the hallway, turn right to see a green block rising to close an opening.
Go to the end of the hall and activate the reach-in switch to open a gate
above. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Now
climb to the upper hallway and activate the reach-in switch there to lower the
green block below. Head back down, shooting the <b><span style='color:red'>scorpion</span></b>
at the bottom of the stairs. Go into the opening where the green block was and
find the reach-in switch to open the last gate above. Climb back up, but have a
weapon ready to shoot the <b><span style='color:red'>hound </span></b>that
charges Lara as she turns the corner. Head down the torch lit stairwell and
shoot another <b><span style='color:red'>hound</span></b> that comes bounding
up the stairs [together with another <b><span style='color:red'>scorpion</span></b>].
Continue to the bottom and then drop into the hall near the door to the large
lava room where you started. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Combine
the 2 CARTOUCHE PIECES and place the <b><span style='color:navy'>BA CARTOUCHE</span></b>
in the receptacle to open the gate to the right. Proceed down the newly opened
passage. As you approach, another gate ahead opens. To your left is another
golden receptacle, to the right an EYE PIECE behind a closed gate. Go ahead to
the top of the corridor. The gate closes behind you. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>SPIKE
BALL ROOM</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Notice
the ramps coming down from the sides of the room, the first immediately as you
enter. Slide or jump into the room as spiked balls come rolling down the first
ramps. Quickly approach the second ramps and stop just long enough to let a
spiked ball roll past. As soon as it clears the footpath Lara is on run ahead
past the second ramp or a spiked ball will flatten you from behind. Without
stopping, continue running past the third ramp and the spiked ball should miss
Lara there. Approach the last ramp and wait for an opportunity to jump past it
when the spiked ball is out of the way. Go through the doorway as the gate
shuts behind you. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>SLOPING
BLOCK AND LAVA ROOM</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Ignore
the lever for now [as well as the reach-in switch you'll find near the torch]
and head past the torch to the back of this small room. Find an opening in the
ceiling in the corner and jump to grab the ladder and climb to the next room.
Jump and pull up on the raised block directly by the top of the ladder. Facing
to the north, angle a running jump to the far sloping block (the one that
slants down toward the east). Slide and jump to the next sloping block, then to
a third and finally up to level ground. Look left to see the <b><span
style='color:navy'>BA CARTOUCHE</span></b> on a column in the corner of the room.
Make a running jump to get it. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>When
Lara picks up the CARTOUCHE, a flyby shows the room filling with sand. As the
flyby ends, the column Lara is standing on collapses. Pull out a weapon to
shoot the <b><span style='color:red'>hound</span></b> that charges up. Jump
over a short sand bank to the west side of the room and shoot the <b><span
style='color:red'>hound </span></b>and <b><span style='color:red'>scorpion</span></b>
there. Continue back to the opening in the floor where you entered. Before
going down the ladder, jump to the other side of the opening and push the lever
there to raise the gate below. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Back
down in the small room, activate the reach-in switch and push the lever. This
raises two new columns back out in the Spike Ball Room (with levers atop each).
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>SPIKE
BALL ROOM</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Walk
back through the gate to the Spike Ball Room and stop on the first square. Wait
for one more spiked ball to come crashing down in front of Lara. Jump over the
hole in the footpath and find the first lever on the column to the left. Make a
running jump/grab there and push the lever (NOTE: Lara will have to shimmy to
the very outer edge of the column before pulling up in order to be in a
position to push the lever). [Take a standing] jump back to the footpath below.
Jump over the next hole W, making your way back toward the entrance to the room.
Find a second switch atop a column to the right. Make your way up to push the
switch and then return to the footpath.<br>
<br>
The gate guarding the EYE PIECE in the corridor outside [opposite the cartouche
receptacle] is now open. Lara will have to make a long running jump to clear
the slope leading back to this passage. Once you have the <b><span
style='color:navy'>EYE PIECE</span></b> in hand, place the <b><span
style='color:navy'>BA</span></b> <b><span style='color:navy'>CARTOUCHE</span></b>
in the nearby receptacle to open the gate in the corner of the small room at
the other end of the Spike Ball Room. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Make
your way back across the Spike Ball Room to the small room at the other end. As
you enter, turn left and find another opening in the ceiling. Climb the ladder
to the room above. Make a running jump/grab over the left side of the spike pit
ahead. Pull up and immediately drop back and hang from the edge while a spiked
ball whizzes over Laras head. Pull up and run straight to the top. Pick up
another <b><span style='color:navy'>BA CARTOUCHE</span></b> there. If you dont
want to be chased by another spiked ball, return down the ramp on the same side
you came up. Jump the spike pit and notice the lever that has appeared at the
bottom. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>GOLDEN
STAR #1</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Push
the lever and return one more time over the spike pit and to the top of the
ramp. Look for the crawlspace that has opened near the ceiling on the left-hand
side and climb in for <b><span style='color:green'>Secret #15</span></b>: <b><span
style='color:blue'>red shotgun</span></b> <b><span style='color:blue'>shells</span></b>
and a <b><span style='color:maroon'>GOLDEN STAR</span></b> (<i>NOTE: This star
is not a puzzle piece; rather, it is first of eight [scattered throughout the
entire Rescue series] that will allow access to a bonus level at the end of the
series if all are found</i>). Return to the small room with the torch below and
leave by the door in the SE corner. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Place
the BA CARTOUCHE in its receptacle to open the gate ahead. Before going
through, step into the opening on the right and walk up to the slope. Use your
binoculars with night vision (ctrl key) [using the sprint key to zoom in] to
look at the pattern at the top of the slope. Memorize the yellow highlighted
squares. Lara will need to jump on these squares in this order (starting from
the frog square at the bottom) to open the doors in the next room. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>ROOM
WITH HIEROGLYPH CUTOUTS ON FLOOR</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Ignore
the lighted squares. To open the 4 gates in this room, Lara need only jump on
the 4 squares highlighted with yellow in the diagram, starting with the frog in
the first row. Lara must not touch any other square or 1 or more of the doors
will close. The squares catch on fire as Lara leaves them, so if you make a
mistake have Lara stand on the raised square in the NE corner of the room to
reset the puzzle.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>[Starting from your
left, identify the vertical rows as A, B, etc.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>Jump to these squares, starting from C1: E3, C5, A7.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>If you hear a thud along the way, you know
that you need to start over.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Standing
jumps from the corners will get you there safely.] <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Once
the 4 gates are open, go through each in turn and activate the reach-in switch
inside (the order doesnt matter). The sand door will now creak open, allowing
Lara to exit. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>ROOM
WITH SLICING BLADES</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Go
through the newly opened sand door and around the corner of the passageway.
Dont run into the room ahead yet or slicing blades will zing down on Lara.
Instead, find the opening in the left side of the corridor and activate the
reach-in switch. This opens an alcove in the corridor back toward the sand
door. Go there and activate another reach-in switch. The slicing blades are now
disarmed, so proceed through the room and into the passageway on the other
side. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>BROWN
GRANITE ROOM WITH POLES</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>First
look to the left and notice the black ladder on the wall. The flame at the base
makes it impossible for Lara to get there. Lara must make her way to the other
end of this room, using the gray platforms to the right and the poles in the
center.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Angle a running jump down to the
first gray platform below and to the right. Set up a jump and grab to the first
pole. Holding onto the pole, turn Lara around so her back is facing toward the
next gray platform. Do a back flip on to the second platform. Jump to the next
pole, turn Laras back to the landing at the end, and back flip to it.<br>
<br>
Now climb the ladder to the right and stand on the illuminated hieroglyph. The
flame back under the other ladder is now extinguished.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Using the poles again, make your way back to
the first gray platform. Jump and grab the higher landing at the east end of
the room. Now make a running jump to the bottom of the ladder on the other
side. Climb the ladder and move right to land on a platform above.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>[For
some reason the flame did not go out for me.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>If that should happen to you, get back across to the other ladder, using
the gray platforms and poles.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Climb up
the ladder, turn around and take a running jump, curving to the left to land on
a slope above the ladder.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Slide down a
bit and jump off with a roll to grab the ladder in the wall.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>If you want the revolver ammo, reverse the
directions provided below.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Otherwise,
climb up a bit, jump off with a roll to grab the ladder in the opposite wall,
and make your way up to the opening.]<br>
<br>
Turn around to see another ladder opposite. Angle a jump + grab to it [or take
a running jump to land in the far front corner] and climb into the opening
there for the <b><span style='color:blue'>revolver ammo</span></b>. Now turn
back to face the next ladder on the east wall. Do a running jump and grab the
ladder. Move all the way to the right side of the ladder and position Lara
about halfway up. Do a rolling back flip and grab the ladder on the wall
behind. Move to the far left side of this ladder and do another rolling back
flip and grab the ladder on the other wall. Climb up and around the corner into
a short hallway. Push the lever to open the gate below, slide down the ramp and
enter the now opened doorway at the bottom. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>MAZE
WITH CAVE PAINTINGS</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>At
the first juncture, go to the left. Notice the closed gate toward the right,
but continue straight ahead S. Follow this passage to its end, shooting a <b><span
style='color:red'>hound</span></b> en route, and stand on the illuminated
hieroglyph. The gate you saw before has opened. Return there and pick up the
second <b><span style='color:navy'>EYE PIECE</span></b>. Go around the corner
to the passage that parallels this one and push the lever to open a gate in the
next branch of the maze (keep an eye out for the <b><span style='color:red'>hound</span></b>
that was released at the same time). <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>From
the door where you first enter, now go right [north]. At the first juncture, go
right and around the corner. Stand on the illuminated hieroglyph. Return to the
juncture and follow the tunnel in the other direction. At the next juncture, go
right and follow the passage to another illuminated hieroglyph. Step on it,
then return to the juncture. Go straight, past the closed gate, and follow the
passage to its end. Step on the final hieroglyph to open the gate you just
passed by. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Return
and go through the now open gateway. Climb the stairs and follow the path to
the giant octagonal door. Combine the 2 EYE PIECES and use the <b><span
style='color:navy'>EYE OF HORUS</span></b> to open the door. Run down the
passageway ahead to end this level and return to the previous one. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><i><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>PHILAE'S
RUINS</span></i></b><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>
(cont.)</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><br
style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
<![if !supportLineBreakNewLine]><br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><br>
The small gold statue you saw through the gate some time ago is now before you.
Pick up the<b><span style='color:navy'> SANDS</span></b> <b><span
style='color:navy'>STATUE</span></b> and go through the open gate and to the
left. At the end of the tunnel, pull up to find yourself back in the deep pit
with the columns. The tunnel entrance at the west end is now open, so make your
way there and into the tunnel. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>ROOM
WITH DEEP CHASM AND FLAMING PLATFORMS</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>As
Lara approaches the next room, a flyby gives us a tour: a deep chasm at the
bottom of 2 steep slopes, a ninja patrolling the ledge on the other side, and a
WATERS KEY atop a pillar at the south end of the room. The first objective is to
lower the iron box that blocks the pillar with the KEY. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Lara
will have to use the platforms with the holes on top to make her way to the
other side of the room where the ninja is. However, these platforms start
emitting flames shortly after Lara steps on them, so move from one to the next
as quickly as possible. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Begin
by stepping down to the very left side of the platform directly below the
doorway you stand in . Immediately turn toward the right and make a running
jump to the platform on the LEFT side of the column ahead. As quickly as
possible, arrange a running jump to the platform against the north wall.
Finally, make a running jump/grab to the landing to the west and pull up on
flat ground. [This can be done in one fairly continuous, fluid motion without
having to waste time positioning Lara before each jump. Use the left arrow key
to pull Lara to the left in mid-air while making the jump to the platform
against the north wall.] Pull a weapon and take care of the not-so-aggressive <b><span
style='color:red'>ninja</span></b>. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Close
at hand on the north wall is a button. Push it to lower the iron box guarding
the KEY on the platform at the south end of the room. From the landing where
you just pulled up, make a running jump + grab back to the platform under the
monkey bars. Jump up to grab the monkey bars and swing across to the south end
until Lara is hanging over the KEY. Drop down and pick up the <b><span
style='color:navy'>WATERS KEY</span></b> and immediately [before the flames
pour through the holes and engulf Lara] jump back up to grab the monkey bars.
Turn and swing back to the platform at the north end and jump back to the wide
ledge on the west side. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Place
the WATERS KEY in its receptacle near the flaming column at the south end of
the ledge. The chasm in the middle to the room is now filled with water (and <b><span
style='color:red'>crocodiles</span></b>). Shoot the reptiles and jump into the
water. Swim to an opening below and to the left of the pillar [S wall] where
you picked up the KEY. Swim in and to the right. Near the end of the short
tunnel and on the left, is a narrow gap. Swim in and pick <b><span
style='color:blue'>Uzi clips</span></b>. Swim back out and around the corner
[through the narrow opening] to pick up some more <b><span style='color:blue'>Uzi
clips</span></b>. Swim back out to the main room. As you exit the tunnel swim
up and right to find an opening [in the south wall, near the east corner] at
the waters edge. Climb out and push the button at the end of the corridor. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>The
button has opened a gate in a corridor directly opposite this one on the north
wall. Make your way there and climb out of the water. When you reach the end of
the corridor, make long running jump over the lava pit to the slope beyond.
Slide and jump over some more lava to the next slope, and make one final jump
to clear the flame emitters. Push the button to start a small tremor that
reshapes the room. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Climb
up to the right, run ahead and climb up again to find the second <b><span
style='color:navy'>SANDS STATUE</span></b>. Now make a little detour for some
goodies and a secret. Jump across to the ledge below the entrance. Turn and
locate another flat area just to the west. [Light a flare so you can see.] Jump
over to it. Now jump and grab the crawl space above in the west wall. Crawl in
and turn right at the first juncture to pick up <b><span style='color:blue'>Uzi
clips</span></b>. Turn and crawl the other way to the end of the crawlspace. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Climb
over and up the blocks ahead to reach the long gallery with the sun roof. Pick
up the <b><span style='color:blue'>large medpak</span></b> + <b><span
style='color:blue'>blue shotgun shells</span></b> from the pedestals at the far
end. Climb back down and find another crawl space at the base of the east wall
in the dark gray stone. Crawl in and turn directly right to find <b><span
style='color:green'>Secret #16.</span></b> When Lara can stand up, climb up on
the block to her left. Jump over the flame to the other [NW] corner of the room
and pick up the <b><span style='color:blue'>red shotgun shells</span></b>. Now,
facing east, make a running jump to the floor of the room, avoiding the flames.
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Climb
the block in the NE corner and push the button to lower the iron box across the
way. Jump over and enter another narrow galleria. About halfway through it,
look up to the right for an opening in the wall above. Jump up to the opening,
crawl through and drop to the ground on the other side. [Lara will pull up,
attempt to stand and fall back down into the narrow galleria.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>I was finally able to keep her in a crouched
position and crawl forward, but I couldn't duplicate this move on later
attempts.]<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Pick up the <b><span
style='color:blue'>red shotgun</span></b> <b><span style='color:blue'>shells</span></b>
and draw a weapon to take care of the <b><span style='color:red'>ninja</span></b>
that emerges from behind the palm tree. Climb back through the hole to the
narrow galleria. Continue to its end and pick up the <b><span style='color:
blue'>crossbow explosive ammo</span></b>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Now
make your way all the way back to the large flooded room where you began. [Do
this by turning around and running to the end of the galleria. Turn around and
drop down to the block. Jump down to the floor and carefully walk over to the
block near the SW corner. Side step in front of the flames to its left side and
pull up to the top. Drop down the other side into the hole in the SW corner. Go
through the crawl space and turn left. In the adjacent room, face north and
pull up onto the block to the left. Jump straight ahead to the crawl space.
Crawl in and make an immediate right, then wind your way to the opening. Turn
around, drop down to the slope and slide to the bottom. Face slightly NE and
take a standing jump over the flames toward the button you pushed earlier. Turn
to the right, climb up on the block, run forward and climb up onto the next
block. Turn right and take a running jump to the floor. Zig to the right and
take a standing jump over the slope into the tunnel leading back to the pool.]
Climb out of the water [in the opening in the east wall] where you entered this
room and return to the deep pit with the red-patterned columns. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Use
the columns to climb back to the area with first deep pit. Shoot a <b><span
style='color:red'>scorpion</span></b> and jump over the pit, and return to the
starting room via the stairs and the water tunnel. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>ROOM
WITH RED-PATTERNED COLUMNS</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Two
seated statues flank the door in the north wall. Place a SANDS STATUE in the
niche on the back of each one to open the door. Inside to the left, behind the
newly opened door is a box of <b><span style='color:blue'>red shotgun shells</span></b>.
When Lara picks them up, a <b><span style='color:red'>scorpion</span></b> will
sneak up from behind.. At the bottom of the short set of stairs is a button on
the wall. Push it to open the adjacent door. Look to the top of the short
stairs here to see a large vase. Shoot it and collect the <b><span
style='color:blue'>crossbow normal ammo</span></b> hidden inside. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>ROOM
WITH SMALL POOL AND SEATED STATUE</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Head
through the door the button opened. To the left, across an empty pool, a <b><span
style='color:red'>ninja</span></b> will start blasting Lara with his Uzi. Blast
him back and pick up the <b><span style='color:blue'>uzi ammo</span></b> he
drops, then the nearby <b><span style='color:blue'>small medpak</span></b>.
Notice the door in the east wall, as well as the statue niche guarded by the
flame emitters. Lara has a bit of work to do to open this door. Pick up the <b><span
style='color:blue'>flares</span></b> in the shallow depression to the right of
the large staircase (NE). To the left, grab the <b><span style='color:navy'>UZI</span></b>
between the two columns. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>HALLWAY
WITH SMALL LAVA PIT</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Now
head up the stairs and climb the block at the top. Keep climbing to the top of
the long ladder and then head around the corner of the short corridor at the
top. Jump the small lava pit and find the ladder to the left. At the top of the
ladder, crawl in to the narrow gap, turn, and drop down in a narrow cubby on
the other side for <b><span style='color:green'>Secret #17</span></b>: <b><span
style='color:blue'>red shotgun shells</span></b> + <b><span style='color:blue'>Uzi
clips</span></b>. Climb back into the narrow gap at the top. This time crawl
out in the direction of the lava pit. With Lara hanging from the side of the
column [top right corner], do a back flip with a roll and grab the cranny in
the wall behind. Shimmy to the left [and around the corner] until Lara can
crawl into the gap. Drop to the other side and push the button at the bottom of
the stairs. Return to the room far below with the empty pool [remembering that
there's a long climb down that ladder at the end of the tunnel]. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>ROOM
WITH SMALL POOL AND SEATED STATUE</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>The
small pool is now filled with water. Jump in and pick up the <b><span
style='color:blue'>revolver ammo</span></b> on the bottom. Swim to face the
underwater door and use the action key to open it. (<i>NOTE: The button on the
wall of the pool was used only if Lara falls or drops into the pool when it is
empty. It raises a block to allow her to climb out</i>). Swim through the short
tunnel and emerge in a room with a burning pedestal. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>ROOM
WITH BURNING PEDESTAL</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>In
the SW corner, look through a small gap to see a vase. Shoot it. Climb the
short block that was to Laras left as she came out of the water. Jump and grab
the edge above [facing W] and pull up into a short corridor. Around the corner
and straight ahead is a gap at the top of the wall (notice the closed gate to
the left). Climb in and drop and hang off the other side. Shimmy all the way
right, then drop and shoot a second vase on the small landing. Drop back down
through the opening at hand to the room below. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Repeat
the climb back to the crawlspace above. This time shimmy just around the corner
and pull up into the gap. Drop on the other side and shoot a third vase in a
shallow hole in the corner. Notice the small opening high in the wall to the
west. It is blocked by a gate. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Use
the crawl space to return to the upper corridor. The gate is now open. At the
end of the corridor is a button. Push it to open a door in the room below. Head
back down and through the open doorway in the SE corner. Activate the reach-in
switch to open the other gate upstairs where you shot the third vase. Return
there, climb into the gap, turn and drop down to the next room. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Jump
into the pool and pick up the <b><span style='color:navy'>GARDENS KEY</span></b>
on the bottom. Now swim through the small hole in the north wall of the pool.
Turn right and swim through another narrow breach and around the corner to pick
up the <b><span style='color:navy'>WATERS KEY</span></b>. Return the way you
came. On the floor under the opening back to the pool, pick up the <b><span
style='color:blue'>crossbow explosive ammo</span></b>. Get some air out in the
pool. Now swim back through the hole and turn left. Follow the tunnel past a
few turns to its end. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>ROOM
WITH RED-PATTERNED PILLARS AND ROPE</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>[Pull
out and make your way to the N wall.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>Turn left into the alcove and step on a trigger tile to make a rope
appear in the next room.] Arrange a running jump E across and to a flat spot to
the right of the small lava pit [using a midair curve to the right]. Pull a
weapon to take care of the <b><span style='color:red'>ninja</span></b> that
charges around the corner. Find the ladder and climb it to the landing above.
Walk to the end and turn east to see a small landing near the north wall with a
button. Make a running jump there and push the button to open the door high on
the south wall. Jump back to the landing at the top of the ladder.<br>
<br>
Now facing east, jump [past the rope] to the pillar with the column on top.
Jump across to the next pillar to the east. Drop down N into the alcove below
and place the WATERS KEY in its receptacle. Climb back out and return to the
landing above the ladder. Along the way, a cut scene shows the fire has been
extinguished in front of the statue niche back by the small pool. Now to find the
statue. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Jump
and grab the rope and use it to swing up to the landing under the door high in
the south wall. Climb out and pick up the <b><span style='color:blue'>crossbow
explosive ammo</span></b> on the pedestal to the right, triggering the other
door in the room to open. Go through the doorway (if you step on the red sand
in the middle, a <b><span style='color:red'>scorpion</span></b> will appear). <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>LONG
SLIDE WITH LAVA PITS</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Lara
must now slide down a series of chutes, jumping 3 lava pits along the way. Try
to make your jumps as close as possible to the edge of each pit in order to
clear it. Once you reach the bottom safely, climb up and run back along the
ledge against the east wall to pick up the <b><span style='color:blue'>revolver
ammo</span></b>. Look out the second window to see the grenade gun in the
distance. Lara cant reach it just yet. Now look up and take note of the button
high on the west wall of the room. Youll return here later. For now, exit
through the doorway in the SE corner. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>COURTYARD
WITH OBELISKS AND GOLD STATUE</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Around
the corner, look across the lava pit to see the GOLD STATUE on a pedestal in
the distance. Theres no way to reach it yet, so head through the opening in
the sand bank to the south and find the open pool. Jump in and pick up the <b><span
style='color:blue'>revolver ammo</span></b> and <b><span style='color:blue'>grenade
gun normal ammo</span></b> at the bottom. Swim into the tunnel heading east. At
the juncture, look left and notice the closed door, then swim up and to the
right until you reach a dark underwater door on the right side of the tunnel.
Open the door and swim into the next channel, making the first left toward an
iron gate which opens as Lara approaches. <br>
<br>
<b>ROOMS REACHED BY WATER TUNNELS</b><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Climb
out of the pool SW and shoot the <b><span style='color:red'>scorpion</span></b>
that approaches. Then shoot the vases on both sides of the room and pick up <b><span
style='color:blue'>blue shotgun shells</span></b> and <b><span
style='color:blue'>Uzi clips</span></b>. Find the button on the pillar under
the window [behind the column near the SW corner] and push it to open the door
back toward the beginning of the water tunnel. Return there and climb out.
[Swim into the tunnel and turn right at the juncture. Turn left at the bend and
turn downward into the hole at the end. At the bottom keep swimming straight
ahead (north) through the open door and up until you reach the air hole.] Take
note of the patter of crocodile feet behind the iron gates. Push the button
between the 2 iron gates to raise an iron box back in the room you just came
from. Swim back there.<br>
<br>
Climb the short pillar at the back of the room and angle a running jump/grab to
the pillar under the window. Jump to the iron box, then make a running jump
with grab to the fissure in the wall ahead. Shimmy right until Lara can pull up
into the opening. Drop into the depression below and look left for a dark
opening. Climb up into it and pick up the <b><span style='color:blue'>Uzi clips</span></b>
around the corner. Now head the other direction and down the stairs to the
water opening. Swim to the end of the channel and emerge on a balcony. Push the
button to open the door above the small pillar back in the main room. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>GOLDEN
STAR #2</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>
<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Return
to the main room. Before entering the open doorway, Lara will have to find a
way to open another door inside that room. Jump in the pool and swim back N
past the iron gate. Go left and past an underwater door on the right, then up
to exit the tunnel. Climb the blocks ahead and push the button to open the
other door. Drop to the block below. Instead of heading back to the water
tunnel you just came from, make a running jump over it and the sand bank ahead
[from where you now stand] to land in another opening. Swim to the end and up
through the opening. Climb the blocks up to the ledge to find <b><span
style='color:green'>Secret #18</span></b>: <b><span style='color:blue'>small
medpak</span></b> + <b><span style='color:blue'>crossbow explosive ammo</span></b>
+ <b><span style='color:maroon'>GOLDEN STAR #2</span></b>. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Return,
using the underwater door to exit this tunnel [turn left at the intersection,
then take an immediate right] and make your way back to the main room. Climb up
to the open doorway above the short pillar and push the button at the end of
the room. Draw a weapon to take care of the <b><span style='color:red'>ninja</span></b>
that charges into the room. That done, head back out to the main room. (<i>NOTE:
The small water opening only leads to a closed door now. Also, take note of the
button blocked by the iron box</i>). <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Outside
in the main room, notice the iron box which has risen in the middle. Drop to
the short pillar below the doorway and make a running jump/grab to the iron
box. Look to see the other door high on the wall is open now. Jump to the red
patterned pillar against the east wall, and then arrange a running jump/grab to
the other open doorway [to the south]. Inside, cross the boardwalk and push the
button at the back of the room. The boardwalk collapses to reveal a lava pit.
Arrange a running jump over it and to the platform on the right or left. Dont
stay too long on the platform, as it will soon burst into flames. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Outside
in the main room, another iron box has risen between the columns by the east
wall. Angle a running jump/grab to the first column, then use the iron box to
cross to the next. Activate the reach-in switch to open the 2 iron gates back
in the room at the other end of the water tunnel. Swim back there and be
prepared to tangle with the <b><span style='color:red'>crocodile</span></b>
that is now free. Once hes dealt with, push the button on the back side of the
column between the two gates. A flyby shows iron boxes have been raised in the
lava pit outside, and the <span style='color:black'>GOLD STATUE</span> can now
be reached. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>COURTYARD
WITH OBELISKS AND GOLD STATUE</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Return
by the water tunnel to the courtyard and use the iron boxes to jump across and
retrieve the <b><span style='color:navy'>GOLD</span></b> <b><span
style='color:navy'>STATUE</span></b>. Pick up the <b><span style='color:blue'>Uzi
clips</span></b> in the corner. Now head back over to the doorway where you
originally entered this area (to the room with the long slide and lava pits). A
column now stands below that button high on the wall [to your left in the dark
area as you climb up onto the block]. Climb up and push it, then return to the
courtyard. Along the way, youll hear an explosion. Around the corner to the
left, Lara can go through a new opening [drop down into a sandy area with a
couple of palm trees and streaked designs on the floor] and pick up <b><span
style='color:green'>Secret #19</span></b>: <b><span style='color:blue'>small
medpak</span></b> + <b><span style='color:navy'>GRENADE GUN</span></b>. After
retrieving them, head back to the pool leading to the water tunnels. [An iron
box rises behind you, preventing re-entry to this area.] <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>This
time, take the other tunnel (leading to the south). Not far along, keep an eye
out for an underwater door on the right. Behind it lies <b><span
style='color:green'>Secret #20</span></b>: a <b><span style='color:blue'>large
medpak</span></b>. After picking it up, continue down the water tunnel
[swimming over the opened door]. As Lara approaches the corner a <b><span
style='color:red'>crocodile</span></b> attacks. Get past it as well as you can,
and swim to the end of the tunnel to emerge back in the first room of the level
(the iron gate opens as you approach). If you like, wait for the crocodile to
surface and blast it. [Go through the open door to the north, turn right at the
ramp facing the room beyond and vault up into the next room. Turn left and
locate the niche behind the statue.] Go and place the GOLD STATUE in its niche
to open the adjacent door. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>OUTSIDE
NEAR THE GRAY STONE STRUCTURE</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Head
outside through the open doorway [and slide down the ramp]. As Lara turns the
corner by the gray stone structure, a <b><span style='color:red'>ninja</span></b>
awaits. Shoot him and pick up the <b><span style='color:blue'>Uzi clips</span></b>
[unless the ninja picked them up before you shot him]. Follow the footpath
around the perimeter to the other side of the structure. At the end of the
path, drop into a shallow well and push the button to open a gate inside the
structure. Return down the footpath. Near the wall of the structure [when you
turn the corner at the end of the path and are facing to the SW] climb the
slope near the palm tree. A couple of jumps will put Lara on a ledge near the
outer wall above. Make your way behind a second tree and around to the flat
shelf near the east wall. Pick up the <b><span style='color:blue'>revolver</span></b>
<b><span style='color:blue'>ammo</span></b> there.<br>
<br>
Slide down to the pillar with the green tiles on top near the wall of the
structure.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Jump from the pillar to the
top of the wall. [Or access the wall directly by taking a back flip to the
slope behind you, jump off and grab the edge of the wall and pull up.]<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>At the NW end of the wall, find the <b><span
style='color:blue'>blue shotgun shells</span></b>. [Hop down SE], climb down
into the structure and follow the tunnel underground. Climb out of the tunnel,
then ascend the ladder to emerge in an area with blue-trimmed walls. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>AREA
WITH BLUE-TRIMMED WALLS AND WATER OPENING</span></b><span style='font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Follow
the footpath around the corner and until you reach a small slope, Jump the
slope and push the button in the well behind. This opens a door in the adjacent
courtyard, so jump back over the short slope and head S to the open doorway. In
a dark area on the left wall of the room is another button, Push it to open a
door in the water tunnel outside. Notice the door in the shadows at the end of the
boardwalk. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Jump
in the water and follow the passage to another opening. Climb out into a room
you should recognize from before. Lara can now push the button [directly
opposite the pool she just emerged from] that was previously blocked by the
iron box. This opens the door back in the room off the [previous] courtyard.
Head back there and through the open doorway [past the boardwalk]. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>LARGE
POOL BENEATH RAMPARTS</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Run
down to the waters edge. The body of water ahead is divided into three pools
by rock outcroppings. Once Lara jumps in, theres no turning back. Slide into
the water as a <b><span style='color:red'>crocodile</span></b> appears. Swim
left under the rock outcropping then right to find a flat spot where Lara can
climb out at the pools end. Turn and shoot the reptile. Now jump to the steep
sand dune to the north, slide back and grab the edge above the water. Shimmy
all the way left until Lara can climb out on flat ground and pick up the <b><span
style='color:blue'>red shotgun shells</span></b>. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>If
another <b><span style='color:red'>crocodile</span></b> is circling below,
shoot it now. Otherwise, jump back in the water and head through the center
pool and into the third pool to the south. Turn right and find the ledge at the
west end to climb out on. Shoot the second crocodile if you havent before.
Jump to the rock outcropping over the pool to the north. Slide back and grab
the edge over the water and shimmy all the way to the right where Lara can
climb out and grab some <b><span style='color:blue'>Uzi clips</span></b>. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:5.0pt;
margin-left:0in;line-height:normal;mso-pagination:none;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Arial","sans-serif"'>Jump
back in the water and swim into the center pool. Swim up under the rock
outcropping at the east end and climb out.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>Run down the corridor ahead to finish the level. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

</div>

</body>

</html>
